actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to impose a moratorium on new and additional student transportation.

summary.text: Student Transportation Moratorium Act - Provides that the implementation of any order of a court of the United States entered during the period beginning with the day after the date of enactment of this Act shall be stayed to the extent it requires, directly or indirectly, a local educational agency: (1) to transport a student who was not being transported by such local educational agency immediately prior to the entry of such order; or (2) to transport a student to or from a school to which or from which such student was not being transported by such local educational agency immediately prior to the entry of such order.

titles.title: A bill to impose a moratorium on new and additional student transportation.
